#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    if (a == 0)
        return b;
    return gcd(b%a, a);
}

int main()
{
	long long int t,a,b,g,i,flag;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
		g=gcd(a,b);
		flag=0;
		
		if(b==1)
		printf("Yes\n");
		else if(g==1)
		printf("No\n");
		else
		{
		while(b!=1)
		{
			if(g==1)
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
				}
				else
				{
					b/=g;
					g=gcd(a,b);
					}
			}
			if(flag==1)
			printf("No\n");
			else
			printf("Yes\n");
		}
		}
	return 0;
}
